title: Fascinated by this “WTF Notebook” post because 1) it’s a really good...
content:
Fascinated by this “WTF Notebook” post because 1) it’s a really good listening/note-taking idea for new team members 2) applied for weirdly Machiavellian ends, e.g. wanting ppl to think he’s helpful rather than wanting to be helpful.

💬 Join the discussion on kottke.org →
author: Jason Kottke
